mapper.select: select SUM(CASE WHEN trans_type='还款' THEN bill ELSE 0 END) as total_pay, SUM(CASE trans_type WHEN '消费' THEN bill ELSE 0 END) as total_tran from tb_deal_detail as deal where cust_id = #{custId} and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(deal.txn_datatime)

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(bill),0) as dealMoney ,DATE_FORMAT(txn_datatime,'%m-%d') AS dateStr FROM tb_deal_detail where txn_datatime > DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) and cust_id = #{custId} GROUP BY txn_datatime

SELECT IFNULL(count(*),0) AS dealMoney,DATE_FORMAT(a.txn_datatime,'%Y-%m') AS dateStr from tb_deal_detail a WHERE a.txn_datatime > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) and a.cust_id = #{custId} and a.trans_type = '消费' GROUP BY dateStr
